overview: Manilaâ€™s Finest is inspired and based on the life and career of retired Western Police District (WPD) Col.  Jimmy Tiu who last served as the Sta. Mesa police station commander of WPD. The film focuses on the dual functions of a city policeman as he inter-acts with the people in his jurisdiction and as an intrepid cop battling criminal elements with guns blazing.
title: Manila's Finest
